channel.title: 3 questions can any1 help?
channel.description:
1 - how do u make it so the hp above a monsters head dowsnt overlap when it has more than a vertian amount of hp? so it will just go 1 bar like in real rs???
2 - how do you make it so when you press ::char your looks actually change when you press accept, because mine doesent, and how do you get the makeover mage so he can do that for you???
3 - how do you make it when girls wear armor it fits to their body correctly and does not act as if they are a man??
if ANYBODY knows how to fix these problems can you please send me a message with a [tut] on how to do them or leave a comment here about it please do so, thank you!
